name: Nguyen Thanh Luan
about_content: My name is Nguyen Thanh Luan, Currently, Iâ€™m a fourth-year student majoring in Information Technology at the University of Transport and Communications - Campus in Ho Chi Minh City (UTC2). I am particularly interested in web application development, with a strong focus on Backend development and Frontend logic handling. Additionally, I explore and apply machine learning knowledge to my personal projects. My goal is to gain more practical experience, enhance my expertise, and improve my teamwork skills, ultimately aiming to become a Full-stack developer in the future.
